comment: A wire or combination of wires not insulated from one another, with consistent electrical characteristics, used to carry direct current between points in the DC region of the power system.
description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: capacitance
contents.comment: Capacitance of the DC line segment. Significant for cables only.

contents.name: inductance
contents.comment: Inductance of the DC line segment. Negligible compared with DCSeriesDevice used for smoothing.

contents.name: length
contents.comment: Segment length for calculating line section capabilities.

contents.name: resistance
contents.comment: Resistance of the DC line segment.
